CONCLUSION: Violation of Art. 6-1;No violation of Art. 6-1;No violation of P1-1
JUDGES: Anatoly Kovler;Christos Rozakis;Dean Spielmann;Elisabeth Steiner;Giorgio Malinverni;Khanlar Hajiyev
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE , a town in LOC .

CARDINAL . The applicant is a retired serviceman . He enlisted in DATE , and at the material time he was a captain of ORG , occupying on a contractual basis the post of a deputy director of social and political education .

CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP Town Court ordered the command to grant the applicant an early discharge because of the command 's failure to fulfil their obligations under the contract . On DATE this judgment became binding but was not enforced immediately , and the applicant resubmitted his claim .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the command to discharge the applicant for health reasons , to provide him with housing , and to pay MONEY ( RUB ) in damages . On DATE this judgment became binding in the part concerning the discharge and housing . The part concerning the damages was referred for a retrial .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG ordered the command to pay RUB CARDINAL,CARDINAL.CARDINAL in pecuniary and non - pecuniary damage . On DATE this judgment became binding .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant received the flat .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant was discharged from service .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant submitted enforcement papers in respect of the damages , and on DATE he received the sum due .

CARDINAL . At the material time judgments delivered against the public authorities were executed in accordance with a special procedure established , inter alia , by Government 's Decree No . CARDINAL of DATE and , subsequently , by Decree No . CARDINAL of DATE , entrusting execution to ORG ( see further details in PERSON and Others v. GPE , nos . QUANTITY , PERSON , CARDINAL and CARDINAL , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL , DATE ) .
